channel.title: Media Industry on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Media Industry on FinanClub

item.title: CMCSA
item.description: score:-26 Chances: Comcast moves up the date for the Hulu deal with Disney, potentially unlocking new opportunities. Xfinity’s HBCU Fall Tour may contribute to the company’s growth and innovation in the future. Comcast NBCUniversal is named one of the top companies on PEOPLE’s annual ‘100 Companies That Care’ list.

item.title: SIRI
item.description: score:-16 Chances: Strong contender in the media industry with good outperformance potential. Positive Q2 earnings match and potential growth. Dividend declaration and positive financial results. Recent stock price surge and analyst upgrades. Participation in important industry conferences. Risks: Stock price volatility and short-squeeze focus.
